text: The Lost World is a book written by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle in the year 1912. In it, Professor Challenger and his companions travel to find a large plateau in South America where many dinosaur species still live. After a long journey they find the plateau, and witness not only dinosaurs, but two tribes - an ancient Native American people and ape-men who resemble the missing link. After many adventures, they return to London and attempt to describe their adventures to a disbelieving public. == Dinosaurs featured in this story == === Active ones === * Iguanodon * Megalosaurus * Stegosaurus === Inactive ones === * Jeholosaurus * Allosaurus * Dilong * Alectrosaurus * Tyrannosaurus * Daspletosaurus * Albertosaurus * Velociraptor * Tarbosaurus * Lythronax * Nanuqsaurus * Carcharodontosaurus * Ozraptor * Camelotia * Torvosaurus * Barosaurus * Riparovenator * Suchosaurus * Segisaurus * Segnosaurus === Inactive sea reptiles === * Rhomaleosaurus * Cryptoclidus * Plesiosaurus * Mosasaurus * Pliosaurus * Elasmosaurus * Kronosaurus * Tylosaurus * Liopleurodon * Ichthyosaurus * Opthalmosaurus * Temnodontosaurus * Shonisaurus * Shastasaurus * Mixosaurus * Atopodentatus * Tanystropheus * Nothosaurus * Cymbospondylus === Inactive land reptiles === * Diadectes * Cacops * Eryops * Eogyrinus * Hynerpeton * Dimetrodon * Seymouria * Edaphosaurus * Diplocaulus * Diictodon * Lystrosaurus * Gorgonops * Lycaenops * Scutosaurus * Erythrosuchus * Proterosuchus * Euparkeria * Postosuchus === Inactive sharks === * Otodus * Squalicorax * Orthacanthus * Megalodon ==Other websites== * Category:1910s books Category:British novels Category:Science fiction books Category:Dinosaurs in fiction Category:Books by Arthur Conan Doyle
title: The Lost World
